name: NATURE CONSERVANCY
sampleDescriptions: Conservation programs administered by the U.S. Department of Agriculture. Preparing for the 2018 farm bill and the reauthorization of the USDA administered conservation programs.
Conservation programs administered by the U.S. Department of Agriculture. H.R. 2 Agriculture and Nutrition Act of 2018 as passed by the House and amended by the Senate
